title: Study in the U.K. (1 Year Bachelor)
body:
Have you been wondering how to further your studies abroad after HND? Worry no more. 

Here is your oportunity to do a 1 Year Bachelors degree top up in any field of your choice in the U.K. We have several universities offering top up possibilities at very affordable prices. Contact us now and enroll for the January 2024 intake.
